item.description: All right boys and girls.  This ride will be taking place of Saturday's Mohawk Trail ride.  The Mohawk Trail plans will be moved to Sunday May 22.  Eli will be updating the changes to that ride later tonight.  This ride will take place Saturday because of the pending nasty weather that will be coming into western mass.  The allowed rider limit for this ride will not have a cap since there will be no expectations of setting the streets on fire.  The intent of this ride is to meet off of i495 exit 17 at the Rapid Refill gas station/Dunkin Donuts on rt.140 west of 495.  We will be taking back roads in my current home town area and lead up to Kimball's Ice-cream in Westford MA.  This will be the current endpoint for the ride.  This ride will basically be dictated by the weather that will possibly chase us.  Please update and RSVP accordingly.  Hopefully more riders from Tier 1 and NESB can join in.
item.name: A Last Minute Replacement ride for Mohawk Trail!
